login.title: Login
login.accountNotConfirmed: Your account has not been confirmed yet. Please confirm your account to continue.
login.accountAlreadyConfirmed: Your account has already been confirmed.
login.accountAlreadyExists: An account with this email already exists: {{email}}
login.accountAlreadyExistsWithUsername: An account with this username already exists: {{username}}
login.accountAlreadyExistsWithEmail: An account with this email already exists: {{email}}
login.emailSent: Confirmation email sent, please check your inbox

forgotPassword.title: Forgot my password
forgotPassword.body: Enter your email to receive the password reset link

success.title: Check your email
success.message: We sent a password reset link to your email. Please check your inbox.

invalidResetLink.title: Invalid password reset link
invalidResetLink.message: The password reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new link.

unauthorized.title: Unauthorized
unauthorized.message: You do not have permission to access this page
